text:
When using SVG Generation (using SVGGraphics2D class), it is not possible to 
control the structure of the generated SVG Tree. 

To be able to do it, it would be necessary to give access to some of the 
private fields of this class (mainly domGroupManager, domTreeManager, and 
generatorCtx), so the user could subclass them and set the custom manager in 
SVGGraphics2D if necessary. 

A protected 'createXXX' method for each of these fields could be provided, in 
order to be able to use a custom "structure aware" subclass, and avoiding to 
swap the various managers in the middle of a document.
creator: herve.girod@club-internet.fr
